features: 【Healthy / Safe / Non-stick Coating】The heave duty frying pan made with food grade premium coating, the 100% PFOA free, no lead or cadmium material offers a reliable cooking. The nonstick feature max its advantages in cooking & cleaning, help to save 70% efforts & time than traditional pans, adds with less oil or butter using for healthy diet and get access to delicacy easily.

【Quick & Even Heat up】The red and black frying pan made with 3-layer composite material, the middle core-cast aluminum is good at conduct heat quickly and evenly, stable and high efficient than normal cast iron pans. The energy- gathered core added to save much energy & cooking time. The last layer-consolidation core contributes the unique stability for anti-warp.

【Additional Helper-Tempered Glass Lid】The 11 in frying pan packed with a glass lid, which is nice for boiling, frying, steaming, stewing... with the weight of lid self, helps to lock the moisture and flavors easily. Which would be best helper to master all kinds of foods, the pancake, ground beef, steak, bacon, eggs, omelette, chicken! There are two kinds of lid, metal rim or silicone lid, if you do more stewing, braising, the black seamed rim lid would be better to luck moisture.

【Suit for All Stoves】The food grade fried pan made with magnetized base, which suits for all kinds of tops, induction stove, gas cook top, electric, ceramic, halogen & solid fuel cookers.【Nice Look-Luxury Red】The metallic red helps to brighten your kitchen with its luxury sight, just this 28 cm skillet, nonstick, flexible & easy to use, breakfast, lunch, dinner, easy to attract you for home-made cooking from now on, Also perfect gifts for Mother's Day, birthday, Christmas, New Year…

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What is important thing when it comes to skillets? Large: 11 in frying pan with large bottom 9.5 in, home cooks with this skillet provides plenty of room for searing, sautéing, and frying... Safe Coating: Food grade material, the 100% PFOA free, no lead or cadmium. Non Stick: NO need to use much oil or butter to stop food from sticking to the pan while cooking. Cleanup is a breeze too, since there's no stuck-on junk to deal with. Nice Look: Class red and black appearance helps to brighten your kitchen with its exquisite design.

Large Enough Large size for family cooking, nice for boiling, frying, steaming, stewing... Long Handle Safe length of handle, and keep cool while cooking. Magnetized Base Suits for all kinds of tops, induction stove, gas cook top, electric, ceramic, halogen

You would need a glass lid for occasional use! This frying pan design with depth 2", offers a large capacity for boiling, frying, steaming, stewing...so the glass lid would help a lot to lock the moisture and flavors easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Gift for mom. She was impressed with the quality and that says a lot! Also loved the color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This pan is very attractive which will demand your attention !!
reviews.reviewText: This pan even though it's very attractive its most importantly a sound heavy strong pan which gives of a steady even heat all over the pan and of course very easy to clean and the glass top is also a plus !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the look and feel of the product and it cooks very well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was so impressed with the quality of this pan, heavy duty and looks nice, nonstick and supre easy to clean. The lid is pretty practical as well, I love the silicone seal on it. Really a good pan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I really like this
reviews.reviewText: Very non stick so far. I use it almost daily for frying or scrambling eggs and even after several months it’s as good as new. I like the silicone edge on the lid and that it has a lid in case I want to save the bacon grease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I haven't put the handle on because my hands have arthitis.The pan looks great. Deep and large

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The videos should say it all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Diig frying pan.
reviews.reviewText: For me, I can't say enough. I ordered one for my mom. I was completely impressed. At that point I just had to have one even though I have plenty and very pricey. This pan is completely different. Wish I could order a complete set. This pan has a little steam whole in the top. I've never owned one that does. Whatever I cook in it comes out fork tender. No, I'm not a member of this company, nor do I know anything about the. I just know, I want more of these pans. This is one frying pan I truly give 5 stars without reservation. Have one at my own home and one at my mom's home.
